column34:
The Amber Heard ‘bots’ are at it again. First they target That Umbrella Guy who’s ONLY ‘crime’ was presenting the EVIDENCE for the world to see and now they are targeting Andy Signore creator of the Youtube channel Popcorned Planet! Andy has been targeted before with false allegations during the beginning/height of the ‘Me Too’ movement. He was one of the first people after Harvey Weinstein who was publicly accused of HORRIBLE SA. The fact that Andy’s name is even associated with Harvey Weinstein is ludicrous because even comparing their situations or even mentioning them in the same breath is ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS...like comparing two things that are COMPLETELY OPPOSITE(Apples and oranges doesn’t do it justice! It’s more like comparing GOOD & EVIL). Andy was accused of doing some heinous acts and just those ALLEGATIONS ended up costing him almost everything he worked for. A little history about Andy Signore and how he has done more things online than what most people could only dream of doing. Andy is the genius behind MANY online programs & being in various roles for each show from creator, producer, & writer of hugely successful content like Screen Junkies..The Screen Junkies Show...Screen Junkies News...Honest Trailers... Honest Trailer Commentaries...Honest Game Trailers...Man at Arms...Prank it FWD...Super Fan Builds...Movie Fights...Flick Bait...& more as well as being nominated twice for a prime time Emmy Award for "Outstanding Short Form Variety Series" in 2016/17 and has even won 2007 MTV Movie Spoof Award for his 5-min short film United 300. After successful creating more online content that most people couldn’t even imagine creating everything came crashing to a halt in 2017 when someone(I refuse to even name her because it would be giving someone who spreads false allegations more attention than they deserve) FALSLY ACCUSED Andy of SA. Just being accused at that time when ‘Me Too’ movement began was enough to ruin someone without even presenting one piece of evidence that backs up the claim...it is a ‘silver bullet’ that will destroy a person’s everything before they can even speak out against it and drowns out any rebuttal to those accusations whatsoever. Andy was wrongfully terminated from a place he help build into the success it is today and was black listed as a pariah just from the false accusations. Even now when you look up his name it has all of these horrible headlines associated with him and this will stay that way FOREVER all because someone decided to lie about their CONSENSUAL RELATIONSHIP WITH ANDY! It took Andy years before he could show/prove to the world that he was COMPLETELY INNOCENT of what he was being accused of and that his accuser was lying about EVERYTHING. This was why the Johnny Depp Trial held a special place in his heart because he knows first hand how deep the ‘false allegation knife’ can cut. Now, Years later, Andy is being targeted again for speaking the truth! Because he was one of the Youtubers who presented the evidence to the world about how abusive Amber was to Johnny Depp & because Andy was one of the few Youtubers who were able to get EXCLUSIVE CONTENT that showed Amber to be the liar she is...they have targeted him again and are trying to completely destroy his livelihood...AGAIN. They are specifically targeting the video that Andy posted that COMPLETELY PROVES HIS INNOCENCE and shows the ‘receipts’ that back up & prove his innocence! This is UNACCEPTABLE and we can’t sit back and just watch while someone else is falsely accused of something again and EVERY SINGLE TIME we must stand up and make it known we will not let good people be destroyed by lies! Lets show them we support and stand behind Andy and that they can’t do this to innocent people! 

#IStandWithAndySignore

column34:
The Amber Heard ‘bots’ are at it again. First they target That Umbrella Guy who’s ONLY ‘crime’ was presenting the EVIDENCE for the world to see and now they are targeting Andy Signore creator of the Youtube channel Popcorned Planet! Andy has been targeted before with false allegations during the beginning/height of the ‘Me Too’ movement. He was one of the first people after Harvey Weinstein who was publicly accused of HORRIBLE SA. The fact that Andy’s name is even associated with Harvey Weinstein is ludicrous because even comparing their situations or even mentioning them in the same breath is ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS...like comparing two things that are COMPLETELY OPPOSITE(Apples and oranges doesn’t do it justice! It’s more like comparing GOOD & EVIL). Andy was accused of doing some heinous acts and just those ALLEGATIONS ended up costing him almost everything he worked for. A little history about Andy Signore and how he has done more things online than what most people could only dream of doing. Andy is the genius behind MANY online programs & being in various roles for each show from creator, producer, & writer of hugely successful content like Screen Junkies..The Screen Junkies Show...Screen Junkies News...Honest Trailers... Honest Trailer Commentaries...Honest Game Trailers...Man at Arms...Prank it FWD...Super Fan Builds...Movie Fights...Flick Bait...& more as well as being nominated twice for a prime time Emmy Award for "Outstanding Short Form Variety Series" in 2016/17 and has even won 2007 MTV Movie Spoof Award for his 5-min short film United 300. After successful creating more online content that most people couldn’t even imagine creating everything came crashing to a halt in 2017 when someone(I refuse to even name her because it would be giving someone who spreads false allegations more attention than they deserve) FALSLY ACCUSED Andy of SA. Just being accused at that time when ‘Me Too’ movement began was enough to ruin someone without even presenting one piece of evidence that backs up the claim...it is a ‘silver bullet’ that will destroy a person’s everything before they can even speak out against it and drowns out any rebuttal to those accusations whatsoever. Andy was wrongfully terminated from a place he help build into the success it is today and was black listed as a pariah just from the false accusations. Even now when you look up his name it has all of these horrible headlines associated with him and this will stay that way FOREVER all because someone decided to lie about their CONSENSUAL RELATIONSHIP WITH ANDY! It took Andy years before he could show/prove to the world that he was COMPLETELY INNOCENT of what he was being accused of and that his accuser was lying about EVERYTHING. This was why the Johnny Depp Trial held a special place in his heart because he knows first hand how deep the ‘false allegation knife’ can cut. Now, Years later, Andy is being targeted again for speaking the truth! Because he was one of the Youtubers who presented the evidence to the world about how abusive Amber was to Johnny Depp & because Andy was one of the few Youtubers who were able to get EXCLUSIVE CONTENT that showed Amber to be the liar she is...they have targeted him again and are trying to completely destroy his livelihood...AGAIN. They are specifically targeting the video that Andy posted that COMPLETELY PROVES HIS INNOCENCE and shows the ‘receipts’ that back up & prove his innocence! This is UNACCEPTABLE and we can’t sit back and just watch while someone else is falsely accused of something again and EVERY SINGLE TIME we must stand up and make it known we will not let good people be destroyed by lies! Lets show them we support and stand behind Andy and that they can’t do this to innocent people! 

#IStandWithAndySignore
